original_text: Thus all the work of the tabernacle of the tent of meeting was finished, and the people of Israel did according to all that the Lord had commanded Moses; so they did.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 이와 같이 성막 곧 회막의 모든 역사를 마치되 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 다 행하고

sentences.original_text: Thus all the work of the tabernacle of the tent of meeting was finished
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 회막 곧 증거막의 모든 일이 마쳐졌습니다

sentences.original_text: and the people of Israel did according to all
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 자손이 주께서 명하신 모든 것대로 행하였으니

sentences.original_text: that the Lord had commanded Moses
